abstract: Death of Roman Pirozek Jr after he was struck and killed by remote-controlled model helicopter he was piloting in Brooklyn park has prompted New York City parks department to announce review that will determine if changes are needed to enhance hobby’s safety in city's public recreation areas.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and LISA W. FODERARO

lead_paragraph: After his remote-controlled helicopter killed Roman Pirozek Jr., the parks department announced a review to determine if changes were needed to enhance the hobby’s safety.

headline.main: Flying Model Aircraft Comes Under Scrutiny After Fatal Accident in Brooklyn Park
headline.print_headline: Flying Model Aircraft Comes Under Scrutiny After Fatal Accident in Brooklyn Park
